price: ហើយទ្រព្យសម្បត្ដិរបស់គេមិនផ្ដល់ផលប្រយោជន៍ដល់ គេឡើយ នៅពេលដែលគេបានធ្លាក់ចូលទៅក្នុងនរកហើយនោះ។
arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wamā yugh'nī ʿanhu māluhu idhā taraddā
